title: Convert Degrees to Radians with Modulo Operation
description: This function converts an angle in degrees to radians while ensuring that the result is restricted to the range [0, 2PI]. The conversion follows the formula: radians = degrees * (Ï€ / 180). The output value is then limited using the MODR operation.
name: RAD

return_value.description: The calculated radians value, constrained to be within the range [0, 2PI].
